column1: Art Institute of Chicago////If you come from Europe
column2: and have seen a few museums (e.g. Louvre
column5: etc.) you will probably be disappointed at this museum (given the hype on this museum in all tourist attraction guides). They have some very nice pieces of art
column6: but definitely much smaller collections. This said
column7: if you have not been to any of the above-mentioned museums (or the Met in New York)
column8: it is definitely a must see and very worth it.
